message: I'm being generous in this first round, but the money is worth less with every passing round. Let's get this over with!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I understand the time pressure, but this offer reflects the value for both of us.
I'm willing to negotiate, Bob. This offer reflects the changing value of the money. Let's work something out.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We are rapidly approaching the point where this money will be worthless. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
